import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useAuth } from '../../contexts/AuthContext'; import { FaUsers, FaChalkboardTeacher, FaBuilding, FaBook, FaClipboardCheck, FaChartBar, FaCog, FaSignOutAlt, FaPlus, FaEdit, FaTrash, FaEye, FaSearch, FaFilter } from 'react-icons/fa'; import './AdminDashboard.css'; const AdminDashboard = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const { currentUser, logout } = useAuth(); const [activeSection, setActiveSection] = useState('overview'); const [showAddModal, setShowAddModal] = useState(false); const [modalType, setModalType] = useState(''); const [students, setStudents] = useState([]); const [faculty, setFaculty] = useState([]); const [departments, setDepartments] = useState([]); const [courses, setCourses] = useState([]); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false); // Check if user is authenticated useEffect(() => { if (!currentUser) { navigate('/admin-login'); } }, [currentUser, navigate]); const handleLogout = () => { logout(); navigate('/'); }; const handleAddClick = (type) => { setModalType(type); setShowAddModal(true); }; const closeModal = () => { setShowAddModal(false); setModalType(''); }; const navigationItems = [ { id: 'overview', label: 'Overview', icon: FaChartBar }, { id: 'students', label: 'Students', icon: FaUsers }, { id: 'faculty', label: 'Faculty', icon: FaChalkboardTeacher }, { id: 'departments', label: 'Departments', icon: FaBuilding }, { id: 'courses', label: 'Courses', icon: FaBook }, { id: 'attendance', label: 'Attendance', icon: FaClipboardCheck }, { id: 'reports', label: 'Reports', icon: FaChartBar }, { id: 'settings', label: 'Settings', icon: FaCog } ]; const renderOverview = () => (

Dashboard Overview

{students.length}

Total Students

{faculty.length}

Total Faculty

{departments.length}

Departments

{courses.length}

Courses

); const renderStudents = () => (

Student Management

{students.length === 0 ? ( ) : ( students.map((student) => ( )) )}
Name Roll No Registration No Department Section Semester Status Actions

No students found. Add your first student!
{student.name} {student.roll} {student.regNo} {student.department} {student.section} {student.semester} {student.isActive ? 'Active' : 'Inactive'}
); const renderFaculty = () => (

Faculty Management

{faculty.length === 0 ? ( ) : ( faculty.map((member) => ( )) )}
Name Faculty ID Department Email Phone Status Actions

No faculty found. Add your first faculty member!
{member.name} {member.facultyId} {member.department} {member.email} {member.phone} {member.isActive ? 'Active' : 'Inactive'}
); const renderDepartments = () => (

Department Management

{departments.length === 0 ? ( ) : ( departments.map((dept) => ( )) )}
Department Name Department Code HOD Total Students Total Faculty Status Actions

No departments found. Add your first department!
{dept.name} {dept.code} {dept.hod} {dept.studentCount} {dept.facultyCount} {dept.isActive ? 'Active' : 'Inactive'}
); const renderCourses = () => (

Course Management

{courses.length === 0 ? ( ) : ( courses.map((course) => ( )) )}
Course Name Course Code Department Credits Semester Status Actions

No courses found. Add your first course!
{course.name} {course.code} {course.department} {course.credits} {course.semester} {course.isActive ? 'Active' : 'Inactive'}
); const renderAttendance = () => (

Attendance Management

Attendance management features will be implemented here.

); const renderReports = () => (

Reports & Analytics

Reports and analytics features will be implemented here.

); const renderSettings = () => (

System Settings

System settings and configuration options will be implemented here.

); const renderContent = () => { switch (activeSection) { case 'overview': return renderOverview(); case 'students': return renderStudents(); case 'faculty': return renderFaculty(); case 'departments': return renderDepartments(); case 'courses': return renderCourses(); case 'attendance': return renderAttendance(); case 'reports': return renderReports(); case 'settings': return renderSettings(); default: return renderOverview(); } }; if (!currentUser) { return
Loading...
; } return (
{/* Sidebar Navigation */}
TAT

Admin Panel

{navigationItems.map((item) => ( ))}

Welcome back, {currentUser.name}

{currentUser.name.charAt(0)} {currentUser.name}

e.stopPropagation()}>

Add {modalType.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + modalType.slice(1)}

Add {modalType} form will be implemented here.

)}
); }; export default AdminDashboard;
